017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.tools;
019
020import static java.lang.System.err;
021import static java.lang.System.out;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.EXPERIMENTAL;
023
024import java.math.BigInteger;
025
026import org.apiguardian.api.API;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.PlaygroundClass;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter;
031
032/**
033 *  Tester for the retrieval of a
034 *  {@link StringConverter}
035 *  from the service.
036 *
037 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @version RetrieveStringConverter: HexUtils.java 747 2020-12-01 12:40:38Z tquadrat $
039 *  @since 0.1.0
040 *
041 *  @UMLGraph.link
042 */
043@SuppressWarnings( "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr" )
044@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "RetrieveStringConverter: HexUtils.java 747 2020-12-01 12:40:38Z tquadrat $" )
045@API( status = EXPERIMENTAL, since = "0.1.0" )
046@PlaygroundClass
047public final class RetrieveStringConverter
048{
049        /*--------------*\
050    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
051        \*--------------*/
052    /**
053     *  No instance allowed for this class.
054     */
055    private RetrieveStringConverter() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( RetrieveStringConverter.class ); }
056
057        /*---------*\
058    ====** Methods **==========================================================
059        \*---------*/
060    /**
061     * The program entry point.
062     *
063     * @param args The command line arguments.
064     */
065    public static final void main( final String... args )
066    {
067        try
068        {
069            final var stringConverter = StringConverter.forClass( BigInteger.class );
070            stringConverter.ifPresentOrElse( $ -> out.println( "Success!" ), () -> out.println( "Failure!" ) );
071        }
072        catch( final Throwable t )
073        {
074            //---* Handle previously unhandled exceptions *------------------------
075            t.printStackTrace( err );
076        }
077    }  //  main()
078}
079//  class RetrieveStringConverter
080
081/*
082 *  End of File
083 */
